overview: In every relationship, you reach a point where it's time to say those three little words. But what is the right moment to say them? What do you do if they don't react the way you expect? How are you sure that they are The One? For Jennifer (Stormy Daniels) and Dave (Voodoo), that moment has just arrived. In this comedy form Jonathan Morgan, a couple explores the true meaning of their relationship... with a little unsolicited help from their past (and often hysterically disastrous) significant others.
tagline: Three little words can cause one big mess.
title: The One
